word:
Only eternity will reveal what has been accomplished by this kind of ministry, -- how many souls, sick with doubt, and tired of worldliness and unrest, have been brought to the Great Physician, who longs to save to the uttermost all who come unto Him. Christ is a risen Saviour, and there is healing in His wings. (6T 110-111)          Ellen G. White. 

                                               -
 


                             -240-
